ygData.subject: Re: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: I assume you mean you got the lenze from gearheart at level 16, or did you mean you got all 4 lenzes?  If so where do we find Bidl Frugin for the last one?
ygData.messageBody:
I assume you mean you got the lenze from gearheart at level 16, or did you
mean you got all 4 lenzes? If so where do we find Bidl Frugin for the last
one?

Lomack

>It might not be really related, but the trick to killing Gearheart is easy,
>you attack a fairy near the village, but out of sight of othere fairys,
>gearheart will come to you, with only gearheart and a fairy madien, i
>completed this quest alone at level 16. So with a level 14 party it is not
>a hard quest.
>
>Muen level 19 Gnome Warrior
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Joshua Bednarz <thewhitemage@...>
>To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
>Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 3:24 AM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Lets find Bidl Frugin
>
>
>> From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>>
>> Yes It is true.
>> For instance, the gnomish warrior guild leader gives you a quest to seek
>out
>> a clockwork stolen by the faeries. He is smack dab in the middle of the
>> faerie town with all those rather high level faeries, somewhere around 20
>> NPCs that will attack you if you try to attack the clockwork. This quest
>is
>> not given to anyone over level 14, but can't be completed unles you have a
>> 20+ group. Again, it has horrible rewards.
>>
>> >From: Nosferatu <nosferatu@...>
>> >Reply-To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
>> >To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
>> >Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Lets find Bidl Frugin
>> >Date: Thu, 22 Jul 1999 11:27:37 -0500
>> >
>> >From: Nosferatu <nosferatu@...>
>> >
>> >Believe it , verant has this sick and twisted thing about making quests
>> >ungettable at higher levels, and impossible for low levels to actually
>> >solve, for instance this quest. one of the lens you need tog et from
>> >Borxx, a level *30*+ Evil Eye. With verants normal sense of rewards well
>> >get 20 exp pts, a faction adjustment and a tarnished dagger as reward,
>> >note this is a step up from the usual rusty dagger they give us.
>> > another example (again gnome) get tergons spellbook, OK this spawns on
>> >a level 18 or so mob... your reward for solving the quest? a level 4
>> >mage spell.
>> >/Nos
>> >
>>
